column4: If the windows 7 install is broken you may as well just format the whole drive and just run linux unless you have some important files on there
I think however nicofs is a bit exhausted when it comes to Ubuntu installations. ;-)

but once its on there it is SO much better. I am eagerly waiting my flash drive to come in the mail so I can wipe Win7 off my brand new FerrariOne netbook. I have seen light I no longer have the patience for MS
